mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (name, phone, password, nickname, date) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{date});

INSERT INTO tbl_terms (mno, peristalsis, terms_1, terms_2, terms_3, terms_4, terms_5, terms_6_1, terms_6_2, terms_6_3) VALUES (#{mno}, #{peristalsis}, #{terms_1}, #{terms_2}, #{terms_3}, #{terms_4}, #{terms_5}, #{terms_6_1}, #{terms_6_2}, #{terms_6_3});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_user WHERE phone = #{phone} OR nickname = #{nickname} AND password = #{password}
